1.1.1.en: Door Sensor support added. Small bugfixes. Readme file completed properly.

1.1.2.en: New icons and updated app description.

1.2.0.en: Battery pack support and ability to change the number of persons in a room from Homey.

2.1.0.en: New Hiome API support, added App configuration page with multiple Hiome Cores config and mass room occupancy tweaks.
